Class: ProxyBusinessNetworkCardStore

ProxyBusinessNetworkCardStore()

Manages persistence of business network cards by communicating with a real
business network card store in the connector server over the socket.io transport.

Constructor

new ProxyBusinessNetworkCardStore()

Creates a new ProxyBusinessNetworkCardStore

getAll() → {Promise}

Gets all cards from the store.

Source:
  • proxybusinessnetworkcardstore.js, line 154
Returns:

A promise that is resolved with a Map where
the keys are identity card names and the values are IdCard objects.
